means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 伦德地貌名称，来源于古诺斯语，含义是“树丛”(grove)

sentence.Network_en: By Friday at 5:30 p.m., I still hadn't heard from Lund.
sentence.Network_cn: 直到周五下午5点半，我仍未收到伦德的消息。

sentence.Network_en: It was the foreman of the jury, Foster Lund , a dealer in cement, lime and stone.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是首席陪审员福斯特·伦特, 一个做水泥 、 石灰和石块生意的人.

sentence.Network_en: Founder Christine Lund describes event as a source of light exercise with an environmentally friendly twist.
sentence.Network_cn: 比赛创始人克里斯廷·兰德说,这项比赛既是一项轻度锻炼,同时也是一个环保之道.
